detaileddescription.para: This type describes necessary information of a data pointer.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* FTIT_fwritefunc) (void *src, size_t size, void *opaque)
memberdef.name: FTIT_fwritefunc

briefdescription.para: It gets the information of this pointer (CPU or GPU, which device, etc.).

detaileddescription.para:
ptr
The pointer to be checked.
ptrInfo
Output the information regarding this pointer.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function returns the information of the pointer. It is useful for determining the location of data.

briefdescription.para: It copies data from GPU to CPU.

detaileddescription.para:
dst
CPU destination memory address.
src
GPU source memory address.
count
Size in bytes to copy.
ptrInfo
Information of the src pointer.
exec
Information of this execution.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function copies count bytes from the GPU memory area pointed to by src to the CPU memory area pointed to by dst.

briefdescription.para: It copies data from CPU to GPU.

detaileddescription.para:
dst
GPU destination memory address.
src
CPU source memory address.
count
Size in bytes to copy.
ptrInfo
Information of the dst pointer.
exec
Information of this execution.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function copies count bytes from the CPU memory area pointed to by src to the GPU memory area pointed to by dst.

briefdescription.para: Streaming data from GPU to storage.

detaileddescription.para:
FTI_Data
Pointer to the dataset to be copied.
fwritefunc
Pointer to the function that perform file writes.
opaque
Additional data to be passed to fwritefunc.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function streams (pipelines) data from the GPU memory to the storage. The actual writes to the storage are performed by fwritefunc.

A
pointer to the Prefetcher struct
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This function initializes the streaming procedure for data in the GPU. If the data re in the GPU side it also performs the first request to the GPU to copy data.

dfls
A pointer to the Prefetcher struct
size
the amount of data in bytes copied from the gpu to the cpu
fetchData
pointer pointing to the data fetched.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
This data returns a pointer to data copied from the GPU side. It also requests more data from the GPU side.

briefdescription.para: De-allocates Host buffers which will be used for asynchronous communication with the GPU.

detaileddescription.para:
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
De-Allocates 2 host buffers which are going to be used for asynchronous communication with the GPU.

briefdescription.para: Allocates Host buffers which will be used for asynchronous communication with the GPU.

detaileddescription.para:
HostBuffSize
Size in bytes of each buffer.
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
Allocates 2 host buffers which are going to be used for asynchronous communication with the GPU.

briefdescription.para: Copies data from a file to the GPU asynchronously.

detaileddescription.para:
fd
Pointer to the file
dptr
Pointer to the data
numBytes
number of bytes to be written
integer FTI_SCES if successful.
Uses 2 streams to copy data from a file to the GPU device memory.

briefdescription.para: Returns the pointer of a specific host buffer.

detaileddescription.para:
id
The id of the host buffer
pointer To the location of the data buffer.
Returns the pointer of a specific host buffer in bytes

briefdescription.para: Returns the size of each host buffer in bytes.

detaileddescription.para:
integer The size of the buffer.
Returns the size of each host buffer in bytes

briefdescription.para: Copies asynchronously memory from host to device.

detaileddescription.para:
dst
Memory location to copy data to.
src
Memory location to copy data from.
count
Number of bytes to copy
integer FTI_SCES on success.
Copies data from a CPU memory Location to a GPU memory location. Attention neither src or dest can be de allocated until the transaction is finished.
